nodes.text: The Teachings of Kooroo was a scroll of parchment that supposedly contained the meditations of Kooroo, an ancient sage and visionary whom the cult known as the Fellowship of Kooroo considered its spiritual leader. Nibao Glumm, a native of the Mos Eisley spaceport settlement on the Outer Rim Territories planet Tatooine, characterized Kooroo's meditations as "rambling."

At some point by 85 BBY, the scroll had found its way into the private collection of the slicer Shiin, which she held in a library in Mos Eisley. All of the artifacts in Shiin's library, including the Teachings of Kooroo, had been imaged and logged into the local computer system before being locked in an armored vault.
The Teachings of Kooroo was first mentioned in the article "Secrets of Mos Eisley," which was authored by Peter Schweighofer and published in Star Wars Gamer 7 on October 16, 2001.
